statements: SELECT * FROM protocol_upgrades;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_version FROM protocol_upgrades WHERE upgrade_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT upgrade_id, upgrade_name, upgrade_description FROM protocol_upgrades WHERE upgrade_version > 2;
SELECT * FROM protocol_upgrades ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_version FROM protocol_upgrades WHERE upgrade_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM protocol_upgrades WHERE upgrade_version = 2 ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC;
SELECT upgrade_name, upgrade_description FROM protocol_upgrades WHERE upgrade_date >= '2022-01-01' AND upgrade_version < 3;
SELECT upgrade_id, upgrade_name, upgrade_version FROM protocol_upgrades WHERE upgrade_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY upgrade_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM protocol_upgrades WHERE upgrade_version BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY upgrade_version DESC, upgrade_date ASC;
SELECT upgrade_name AS name, CONCAT('Version ', upgrade_version) AS version_text FROM protocol_upgrades WHERE upgrade_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY upgrade_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM protocol_upgrades;
SELECT upgrade_version, upgrade_date FROM protocol_upgrades;
SELECT id, upgrade_version, upgrade_date FROM protocol_upgrades ORDER BY upgrade_version DESC;
SELECT * FROM protocol_changes WHERE upgrade_id = 1;
SELECT change_id, change_description, change_date FROM protocol_changes ORDER BY change_date;
SELECT * FROM protocol_upgrades ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT upgrade_version, upgrade_date FROM protocol_upgrades WHERE upgrade_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.upgrade_version, c.change_description FROM protocol_upgrades p JOIN protocol_changes c ON p.id = c.upgrade_id WHERE c.change_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY p.upgrade_version ASC;

SELECT u.upgrade_version, COUNT(c.change_id) AS total_changes FROM protocol_upgrades u LEFT JOIN protocol_changes c ON u.id = c.upgrade_id GROUP BY u.upgrade_version HAVING COUNT(c.change_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_changes DESC;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(change_date, upgrade_date)) AS avg_days_between_changes FROM protocol_changes WHERE upgrade_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Protocol_Updates ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC;
SELECT id, change_description FROM Protocol_Updates WHERE upgrade_version = '1.0';
SELECT approval_person, implemented_date FROM Compliance_Records WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT version_number, notes FROM Version_Control WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Version_Control ORDER BY version_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Records ORDER BY implemented_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT policy_name, status FROM Compliance_Records WHERE status='Approved';
SELECT upgrade_version, change_description FROM Protocol_Updates WHERE upgrade_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upgrade_date ASC;
SELECT id, policy_name, approval_person FROM Compliance_Records WHERE implemented_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT version_number, release_date FROM Version_Control WHERE version_number LIKE 'v1.%';
SELECT * FROM protocol_upgrade_history;
SELECT upgrade_id, upgrade_description FROM protocol_upgrade_history ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC;
SELECT upgrade_id, upgrade_version, upgrade_date FROM protocol_upgrade_history WHERE upgrade_version = 3;
SELECT * FROM protocol_changes WHERE change_type = 'Bug Fix' ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT version_id, version_date FROM version_control WHERE version_number LIKE 'v1.%';
SELECT * FROM protocol_upgrade_history ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT upgrade_description, upgrade_version FROM protocol_upgrade_history WHERE upgrade_version > 10
SELECT * FROM protocol_changes WHERE change_type = 'Bug Fix'
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type = 'Audit' AND record_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT version_number, version_date FROM version_control ORDER BY version_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ProtocolVersions
SELECT ProtocolID, Version, Description FROM ProtocolVersions
SELECT UpgradeDate, ProtocolID, Version FROM ProtocolVersions ORDER BY ProtocolID DESC
SELECT LogID, ProtocolID, UpgradeType FROM UpgradeLogs WHERE LogTimestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT RecordID, ProtocolID, ComplianceStatus FROM ComplianceRecords
SELECT ProtocolID, Version, Description FROM ProtocolVersions WHERE ProtocolID = 1;
SELECT * FROM UpgradeLogs WHERE UpgradeType = 'Major' ORDER BY LogTimestamp DESC;
SELECT ProtocolID, ComplianceStatus, ComplianceDate FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE ComplianceStatus = 'Approved';
SELECT RequestID, RequesterName, RequestDetails FROM ChangeRequests WHERE ProtocolID = 3;
SELECT ApprovalID, ApproverName, ApprovalDate FROM ApprovalLogs WHERE ApprovalDate >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ApprovalDate DESC;
